We’re excited for tonight’s Meet the Protocol event at CV Labs! Cardano Foundation’s Head of Technical Operations, Steve Wagendorp, will be presenting on #Cardano alongside #IOHK developers. If you’re in the area, join us:  https://t.co/H16Jsy6AoU #CVLabs

Philipp goes on to explain how the team developed the formal specifications for the Cardano ledger. This process is part of the rigorous, scientific approach of Cardano and he also shares its benefit to tonight’s meetup attendees!  https://t.co/jN9czi08Nf

Formal methods is the mathematically-based technique for the specification, development and verification of software. IOHK is unique in applying this to blockchain. Philipp Kant from IOHK explains this process at tonight’s CV labs event!  https://t.co/VnlmAizHcb

Steve Wagendorp, Head of Technical Operations at Cardano Foundation, kicks off tonight’s CV Labs meetup by introducing the Cardano protocol to attendees eager to learn all about it! #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/9kxMEbywA9

In the last part of the presentation, Philipp Kant walks the audience through Marlowe, the DSL created by IOHK for financial contracts. If you're interested in learning about Marlowe, check out this free Udemy course:  https://t.co/5D6NaDK5hv  https://t.co/qRqea8bt65

Now its time for question and answers with all the inquisitive developers and entrepreneurs here tonight. Special thanks to our speakers, Steve and Philipp, and to the Crypto Valley community members who could make it to our event! #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/glGhs8SkPJ
